sentences.sentence: Kendo UI AutoComplete as editor in grid - how to display selected value?
sentences.translation: 剑道UI自动编辑网格-如何显示选定的值？

sentences.sentence: Do you believe that a referee licensing system should be introduced in kendo?
sentences.translation: 您觉得应该把裁判认证系统引入剑道中么？

sentences.sentence: Why does the Kendo grid show false in all records of my grid, even when some have true?
sentences.translation: 为什么剑道网格显示错误在我的所有记录网格，即使有些人真的吗？
